name: Interface BinaryTree
text:
A tree node for a binary expression.
 Use getKind to determine the kind of operator.

 For example:
 
   leftOperand operator rightOperand
codes:
@Deprecated(since="11",
            forRemoval=true)
public interface BinaryTree
extends ExpressionTree

methods.description: Returns left hand side (LHS) of this binary expression.
Returns right hand side (RHS) of this binary expression.
